recipesJson.name: Apple Yogurt
recipesJson.author: Fuzzy055
recipesJson.description: A slightly tart and sweet apple yogurt. You can compare this flavor to one of those commercial sweet yogurts. Im sorry for all you sucralose haters out their, its kinda needed for this recipe to be accurate otherwise you end up with a ejuice that is to sour/tart.

reviews.text: Gotten behind my reviews mixed and vaped this a few months back. The Apple really shined through all the creams. The marshmallow, custard and creamy yogurt. Paired well together to make a really tasty cream base. I did sub some FLV sweetness @ 0.5% instead of the TPA Sweetener
Simple and to the point. Nice mix of the sweet, acidity and yogurt. Although I personally have toned down the sweetener a bit.

This is perfect.  I was expecting a little more sour from the yogurt, but what I got was like biting into a fuji apple...except instead of a juicy, acidic bite I got a sweet, smooth cream.  This is definitely going into my list of bangers.
